title: Process Tenant Maintenance Request
description: A tenant reports a leaking faucet via the tenant portal. The agent must create a work order and dispatch a plumber.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the tenant's maintenance request from the portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the request, tenant, and property.

tasks.description: Create a new work order, categorizing the issue as 'Plumbing - Non-Emergency'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a correctly categorized work order.

tasks.description: Assign the work order to an approved plumbing vendor and notify the tenant that a vendor has been dispatched.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully assigns the job to a qualified vendor and communicates with the tenant.
